Lyric:
[00:23.870]So we talked all night about the rest of our lives
[00:27.320]Where we're gonna be when we turn 25
[00:30.500]I keep thinking times will never change.
[00:33.340]Keep on thinking things will always be the same
[00:36.260]But when we leave this year we won't be.ing back
[00:39.330]No more hanging out cause we're on a different track
[00:41.970]And if you got something that you need to say
[00:45.000]You better say it right now cause you don't have another day
[00:48.020]Cause we're moving on and we can't slow down
[00:50.920]These memories are playing like a film without sound
[00:53.980]And I keep thinking of that night in June
[00:56.940]I didn't know much of love but it came too soon
[00:59.670]And there was me and you
[01:01.600]And then we got real cool
[01:03.140]Stay at home talking on the telephone
[01:06.150]We'd get so excited, we'd get so scared
[01:09.380]Laughing at ourselves thinking life's not fair
[01:13.800]And this is how it feels...
[01:16.070]As we go on, we remember
[01:22.060]All the times we had together
[01:28.040]And as our lives change,.e whatever
[01:33.950]We will still be, friends forever
[01:50.800]So if we get the big jobs
[01:52.500]And we make the big money
[01:54.280]When we look back now
[01:55.380]Will our jokes still be funny?
[01:57.150]Will we still remember everything we learned in school?
[02:00.040]Still be trying to break every single rule
[02:02.900]Will little brainy Bobby be the stockbroker man?
[02:05.980]Can Heather find a job that won't interfere with her tan?
[02:09.080]I keep, I keep thinking that it's not goodbye
[02:12.270]Keep on thinking it's a time to fly
[02:16.390]And this is how it feels....
[02:18.980]As we go on, we remember
[02:25.110]All the times we had together
[02:30.910]And as our lives change,.e whatever
[02:36.900]We will still be, friends forever
[02:42.850]（la la la la la la la la……）
[03:02.080]（We will still be, friends forever）
[03:39.510]Will we think about tomorrow like we think about now?
[03:42.470]Can we survive it out there?
[03:45.150]Can we make it somehow?
[03:46.640]I guess I thought that this would never end
[03:49.910]And suddenly it's like we're women and men
[03:52.110]Will the past be a shadow that will follow us 'round?
[03:55.550]Will these memories fade when I leave this town
[03:57.730]I keep, I keep thinking that it's not goodbye
[04:01.300]Keep on thinking it's our time to fly....
[04:04.980]As we go on, we remember
[04:11.040]All the times we had together
[04:17.040]And as our lives change,.e whatever
[04:22.980]We will still be, friends forever
[04:30.690]As we go on, we remember
[04:35.510]All the times we had together
[04:41.450]And as our lives change,.e whatever
[04:47.430]We will still be, friends forever
[04:53.620]As we go on, we remember
[04:59.670]All the times we had together
[05:05.540]And as our lives change,.e whatever
[05:11.420]We will still be, friends forever
